name: Shop Management System (SMS)
shortDescription: Comprehensive shop management system designed for gold pawning businesses with real-time transaction tracking and role-based access control.
fullDescription: A full-stack enterprise solution for gold pawning shops that streamlines inventory management,invoicing, loan processing, customer tracking, and financial reporting. The system features a modern Angular-based frontend with Material Design components and a robust .NET 8 Web API backend with Entity Framework Core for data persistence. Implements JWT authentication, automated background services for loan maintenance, and comprehensive reporting capabilities.
challenges: Managing complex loan calculations with installment tracking across multiple karatage types while maintaining data consistency
Implementing real-time transaction updates and ensuring secure role-based access control across multiple user types (Admin, Manager, Cashier)
Handling concurrent inventory operations and preventing race conditions during high-volume transaction periods
Designing a scalable architecture to support background services for automated loan status updates and interest calculations
solutions: Implemented repository pattern with Entity Framework Core for robust data access and transaction management
Utilized AutoMapper for clean DTO transformations and separation of concerns
Integrated Serilog for comprehensive structured logging across all services to track operations and debug issues
Developed custom pagination service to handle large datasets efficiently
Implemented JWT-based authentication with role claims for granular authorization
Created background services using .NET hosted services for automated maintenance tasks
Used Angular Material and Bootstrap for responsive, accessible UI components with consistent design patterns

name: TaskMate Mobile App
shortDescription: A comprehensive task management mobile application built with .NET MAUI for connecting customers with service workers.
fullDescription: TaskMate is a full-stack mobile application that bridges the gap between customers seeking services and workers offering their skills. The app features real-time task management, in-app messaging, offer negotiations, review systems, and seamless payment integration. Built with modern architecture patterns including MVVM, dependency injection, and RESTful APIs.
challenges: Implementing real-time notifications across the mobile application
Managing complex state across multiple views and ensuring data consistency
Ensuring seamless data synchronization between mobile app and backend services
solutions: Utilized MVVM pattern for clean separation of concerns and maintainable code structure
Implemented efficient data caching strategies to reduce network calls and improve performance
Created robust API endpoints with proper error handling and validation

name: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Angular 20 showcasing projects and professional experience.
fullDescription: Personal portfolio website designed with a mobile-first approach, featuring smooth animations, glassmorphism effects, and a modern gradient-based design system. The site includes project showcases, detailed about section, contact form integration, and downloadable resume functionality.
challenges: Creating a visually stunning yet performant interface with modern design trends
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design across all devices
Implementing smooth page transitions and animations without impacting performance
solutions: Developed a comprehensive CSS design system with CSS custom properties for consistency
Utilized Angular's latest features and standalone components for optimal performance
Implemented lazy loading and code splitting for better load times and user experience
